answers.answer: I have gestational diabetes I developed around 28 weeks. You get used to the food restrictions. It's actually been easy for me! I control all my sugar numbers by diet except for my fasting number which I take a pill at night to keep my number steady while I sleep. My baby girl will be bigger even though I have only gained 10 pounds. I'm being induced due to gestational diabetes and gestational hypertension at 37 weeks. I'm currently 35 weeks.
Im 31 weeks and doctors saying I have diabetes but havent givin me anything for it yet but said I might need to be hospitalized bc the surgers in my urine are high im so scared:(
Usually your schedules with a dietician to help manage your blood sugar

I met with a dietitian and check my blood four times a day. I've controlled it with my diet so no medicine needed as of now, I'm 36 weeks. Next week I'll get an induction date as I am having a c section. Once you get a meal plan it's really very easy. I was freaked out about it as well, but it's really no big deal as long as you eat right.
